alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 1:23PM CST until January 29 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Guadalupe River At Victoria affecting Victoria County. For the Guadalupe River...including Victoria, Bloomington...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Guadalupe River at Victoria. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.6 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Flood Gate flow line outfall at the Guadalupe River for the Texas Zoo. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage by this evening but remain above caution stage until Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Guadalupe River Victoria 21.0 25.0 Mon 12 pm 12.4 10.2 9.1 8.5 8.0 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
